[[Image:Die Walküre.jpg: '''''Die Walküre''''' is the second of the four operas that comprise ''[[Der Ring des Nibelungen]]'' ("The Ring of the Nibelung"), by [[Richard Wagner]].
During the 1930s, the [[Inklings]] members [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and [[C.S. Lewis]] apparently began working on a translation of ''Die Walküre''.<ref>Stefan Arvidsson,  ''[[Draksjukan
<small>Title page art from 1899</small>: Draksjukan. Mytiska fantasier hos Tolkien, Wagner och de Vries]]'', p.148</ref><ref>Alex Ross, "[http://www.newyorker.com/archive/2003/12/22/031222crat_atlarge?currentPage=1#ixzz0uWWEbKTn  The Ring and the Rings: Wagner vs. Tolkien]", in ''The New Yorker'', December 22, 2003</ref>
